<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file This pass verifies incoming and outgoing CFA information of basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks. CFA information is information about offset and register set by CFI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// directives, valid at the start and end of a basic block. This pass checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that outgoing information of predecessors matches incoming information of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// their successors. Then it checks if blocks have correct CFA calculation rule</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// set and inserts additional CFI instruction at their beginnings if they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// don&#39;t. CFI instructions are inserted if basic blocks have incorrect offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// or register set by previous blocks, as a result of a non-linear layout of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks in a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : CurrMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad88ff1529541fb4e243cc8ed90b11131">successors</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MBBCFAInfo &amp;SuccMBBInfo = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/prologepiloginserter-cpp/#a16e1dce3ef595b035bc2f10e763d0ce6">MBBVector</a>&#91;Succ-&gt;getNumber()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that incoming offset and register values of successors match the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outgoing offset and register values of CurrMBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccMBBInfo.IncomingCFAOffset != CurrMBBInfo.OutgoingCFAOffset ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SuccMBBInfo.IncomingCFARegister != CurrMBBInfo.OutgoingCFARegister) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inconsistent offsets/registers are ok for &#39;noreturn&#39; blocks because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t generate epilogues inside such blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccMBBInfo.MBB-&gt;succ&#95;empty() &amp;&amp; !SuccMBBInfo.MBB-&gt;isReturnBlock())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that IncomingCSRSaved of every successor matches the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OutgoingCSRSaved of CurrMBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccMBBInfo.IncomingCSRSaved != CurrMBBInfo.OutgoingCSRSaved) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
